messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hey guys, there is a ninja on board, so look out for that

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: Friendly messsage to the Ninja, we got a man with a bomb sssuit, a virusss making usss drop like fliesss, and a fuckin homocidal maniac on the loossse, and like 3 ssstolen Mechsss, ssso PLEASSSE jussst wait your turn. If you wisssh to ssspeak DIPLOMATICALLY il be waiting in SSSEC dealing with a bomb

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Ninja is kill, easily top ten anime plot twist

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: For all intentents and purposes we are still in code blue, the green call was just to delay the shuttle, please unfuck things guys

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Well that was actually not a bad shift, good job crew
